TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class Part : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel, System.Web.UI.INamingContainer, System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor

.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Part extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel implements class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor
Public MustInherit Class Part Inherits Panel Implements ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor, INamingContainer
public ref class Part abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::Panel, System::Web::UI::INamingContainer, System::Web::UI::WebControls::ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor

summary.span: 用作所有“Web 部件”部件控件的基类，这些控件在 Web 窗体页上呈现模块化用户界面。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all Web Parts part controls, which render a modular user interface on a Web Forms page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类定义的一部分的所有控件都共有并使其能够在网页上具有模块化且一致外观的属性。The class defines properties that are common to all part controls and enable them to have a modular and consistent appearance on a Web page. 这些常见属性包括标题、 说明和特征的 chrome 或环绕一个部分的控件的框架。These common properties include a title, a description, and characteristics of the chrome or frame that surrounds a part control. 属性指定的标题部分的控件。The property specifies a title for the part control. 属性可用于汇总部件控件的用途，并显示为控件的标题栏中的工具提示。The property is used to summarize the part control's purpose, and appears as a ToolTip in the title bar of the control. 属性决定哪种类型的边框呈现围绕一个部分的控件，而属性指示一个部分的控件是通常情况下，呈现还是最小化。The property dictates what kind of border is rendered around a part control, while the property indicates whether a part control is rendered normally, or minimized. 一个部分的控件的边框受包含它; 的区域的属性例如，属性会影响区域中包含的所有部件控件的帧。The border of a part control is affected by the properties of the zone that contains it; for example, the property affects the frames of all part controls contained in a zone. 一种类型的部分的控件是控件，呈现在对应的区域内的内容。One type of part control is the control, which renders content inside a corresponding zone. 另一个类型是提供用于修改的用户界面 (UI) 控件的控件 （个性化） 各个控件。Another type is the control, which provides user interface (UI) controls used to modify (personalize) individual controls. 一种类型的部分的控件是控件，它提供一份用户可以添加或删除在网页上的控件。A third type of part control is the control, which provides a list of controls that users can add to or remove from a Web page. 部件控件包含在区域，它们都派生自抽象类。Part controls are contained in zones, all of which derive from the abstract class. 区域是负责组织它包含的部件控件。A zone is responsible for organizing the part controls it contains. 每个区域还呈现用户界面元素为其自身，包括页眉、 页脚、 标题栏和每个所包含的部件控件，如边框周围的 UI 元素。Each zone also renders UI elements for itself, including a header, a footer, a title bar, and UI elements around each contained part control, such as borders. > [!NOTE] > 尽管部件控件通常驻留在区域中，它仍可能将一个部分的控件放在区域之外如果控件在网页上的标记中以声明方式引用。While part controls usually reside in zones, it is possible to place a part control outside a zone, if the control is referenced declaratively in the markup of a Web page. 如果一个部分的控件的区域之外声明在网页上，控件将仍正常工作，但将失去其大多数 Web 部件功能。If a part control is declared outside a zone on a Web page, the control still works, but loses most of its Web Parts functionality. 例如，该控件不能编辑，并不能将内容拖入区域在运行时。For example, the control cannot be edited, and cannot be dragged into a zone at run time. 还有很有帮助请记住可从区域中拖动并放置到区域之外的页上，在运行时没有部分的控件。It is also helpful to remember that no part control can be dragged from a zone and dropped onto a page outside of a zone at run time. 基本部件类型的一些示例以及它们对应的区域类型，是下表中所示。Some examples of base part types, and their corresponding zone types, are shown in the following table. |部件控件类型Part control type|区域类型Zone type| |-----------------------|---------------| ||| ||| ||| 各种类型的派生自的一部分控件类以不同方式处理继承的、 面向用户界面的属性。The various kinds of part controls that derive from the class handle the inherited, UI-oriented properties differently. 控件重写几个继承的 UI 属性，并将其与标记`Personalizable`属性 (有关详细信息，请参阅类文档)，从而使这些属性对于将来的浏览器会话，一项功能保存的值称为个性化设置。 controls override several of the inherited UI properties, and mark them with the `Personalizable` attribute (for details, see the class documentation), which enables the values of those properties to be saved for future browser sessions, a feature known as personalization. 例如，如果你以编程方式使用户能够更新的值控件的属性在运行时，值将进行个性化设置 （假设个性化设置启用状态，这是默认设置）。For example, if you programmatically enable a user to update the value of a control's property at run time, that value will be personalized (assuming that personalization is enabled, which is the default). 多个 UI 属性的控件均继承自类，并从类中，处理相同的方式。Several UI properties that controls inherit from the class, and from the class, are handled the same way. 与此相反，另一个部件控件，如和，不能将继承的 UI 属性，以进行个性化设置。In contrast, other part controls, such as and , do not enable the inherited UI properties to be personalized. 出于此原因，以编程方式分配的属性值不会保存为将来的浏览器会话。For this reason, programmatically assigned property values are not saved for future browser sessions. 例如，如果你以编程方式使用户能够更新控件的属性在运行时，更新后的值是丢失后关闭该控件或浏览器会话结束。For example, if you programmatically enable a user to update a control's property at run time, the updated value is lost after the control is closed or the browser session ends. 轻松将值保存在此类继承的 UI 属性和将来的浏览器会话的控件是声明中页持久性格式的属性值。An easy way to save the values on such inherited UI properties for and controls for future browser sessions is to declare the property values in page persistence format. 但是，这是一种静态方法，仍不允许用户进行个性化设置的属性值。However, this is a static approach and still does not allow users to personalize the property values. 或者，如果你想要启用对继承的 UI 属性以编程方式更新，以便用户可以个性化其在运行时，你可以使用专用的静态变量以保存属性值。As an alternative, if you want to enable programmatic updates to the inherited UI properties so users can personalize them at run time, you can use private, static variables to save the property values. 每次的新实例或创建控件 (例如，在处理控件的方法事件)，你可以重新分配给相应的属性的静态变量的值。Each time a new instance of an or control is created (for example, in the method that handles the control's event), you can reassign a static variable's value to a corresponding property. 这种方法使用户能够对进行个性化设置的编辑 UI 和目录的 Web 部件应用程序的用户界面。Such an approach gives users the ability to personalize the editing UI and catalog UI of a Web Parts application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的几个属性的声明方式使用类，通过使用自定义的两个实例ASP.NET 网页中所引用控件。The following code examples demonstrate declarative use of several properties of the class, by using two instances of a custom control referenced in an ASP.NET Web page. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示的编译这两种方法的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 该示例的第一部分包含名为的自定义控件的代码`TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of the example contains the code for the custom control, named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 由于控件派生自，它还会继承的公共属性的类提供，并演示如何使用此代码示例中的这些属性。Because the control derives from , it also inherits the common properties that the class provides, and illustrates the use of those properties in this code example. [!code-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何引用 ASP.NET 网页中的自定义部件控件。The second part of the example shows how to reference the custom part controls in an ASP.NET Web page. 请注意，各种属性以声明方式分配给自定义控件实例。Notice that the various properties are assigned declaratively to the custom control instances. 比较，引用的页上，两个实例的声明性代码，然后加载浏览器中的页。Compare the declarative code that references the two instances on the page, and then load the page in a browser. 请注意的各种属性如何影响控件的外观。Note how the various properties affect the appearance of the controls. 例如，之后加载浏览器中，第二个实例中的页`TextDisplayWebPart`控件将显示最小化，因为其属性值设置为。For example, after you load the page in a browser, the second instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control appears minimized, because its property value is set to . [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/partoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/partoverviewvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 通常情况下，你应不从直接继承开发自定义 Web 部件控件的类。

span.span: Normally, you should not inherit directly from the class to develop custom Web Parts controls.

para.span: 若要提供完整的 Web 部件功能，Web 部件控件集，需要从派生的类类，即， ，和，因此应派生自它们现在可以开发自定义控件。

span.span: To provide full Web Parts functionality, the Web Parts control set requires the classes derived from the class, namely , , and , so you should derive from them to develop custom controls.

para.span: 但是，它是仍必须了解的基本行为类，因为它提供了一组通用的所有其他部件类使用的属性。

span.span: However, it is still important to understand the behavior of the base class, because it provides a common set of properties used by all other part classes.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState ChromeState { get; set; }

summary.span: 获取或设置部件控件是处于最小化状态还是正常状态。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a part control is in a minimized or normal state.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个部分的控件的可以正常或最小化。A part control's can be normal or minimized. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明性使用中一个部分的控件属性。The following code example illustrates the declarative use of the property in a part control. 此示例需要自定义控件`TextDisplayWebPart`，可在示例部分中找到类摘要。This example requires the custom control `TextDisplayWebPart`, which can be found in the Example section of the class summary. 请注意，Web 的声明性标记中页上，第二个实例`TextDisplayWebPart`控件将设置其属性。Note that in the declarative markup for the Web page, the second instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control sets its property. 加载浏览器中后，第二个控件实例将显示最小化。After you load the page in a browser, the second control instance appears minimized. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/partoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/partoverviewvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The value specified is not one of the values.

para.span: 派生类如可以重写启用的控件的边框状态的用户个性化设置。

span.span: Derived classes such as can override to enable user personalization of the control's border state.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType ChromeType { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType ChromeType
Public Overridable Property ChromeType As PartChromeType

summary.span: 获取或设置构成 Web 部件控件的框架的边框类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of border that frames a Web Parts control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个部分的控件的属性确定哪种类型的边框环绕控件。A part control's property determines what kind of border surrounds the control. 选项包括显示标题、 只、 仅边框、 标题和边框，两者，或只需使用的值的默认选项属性。Options include showing a title only, a border only, a title and border, neither, or the default option, which simply uses the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明性使用中一个部分的控件属性。The following code example illustrates the declarative use of the property in a part control. 此示例需要自定义控件`TextDisplayWebPart`，可在示例部分中找到类摘要。This example requires the custom control `TextDisplayWebPart`, which can be found in the Example section of the class summary. 在网页上，第二个实例的声明性代码`TextDisplayWebPart`控件将设置其属性只具有标题，而第一个实例具有标题和边框。In the declarative code for the Web page, the second instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control sets its property to have only a title, whereas the first instance has a title and a border. 加载浏览器中后，将显示最小化控件的第二个实例。After you load the page in a browser, the second instance of the control appears minimized. 如果最大化控件时，会显示不带边框的标题。If you maximize the control, it shows a title without a border. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/partoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/partoverviewvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The value is not one of the values.

para.span: 派生类如可以重写启用的框架控件的边框类型的用户个性化设置。

span.span: Derived classes such as can override to enable user personalization of the kind of border that frames a control.

Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Controls As ControlCollection

summary.span: 获取 对象，该对象包含用户界面层次结构中指定服务器控件的子控件。

span.span: Gets a object that contains the child controls for a specified server control in the user interface hierarchy.

value.span: 指定服务器控件的子控件的集合。

span.span: The collection of child controls for the specified server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET 页上，在开始标记和结束标记的一个服务器控件之间以声明方式添加控件时 ASP.NET 自动将这些控件添加到包含服务器控件的对象。On an ASP.NET page, when controls are added declaratively between the opening and closing tags of a server control, ASP.NET automatically adds the controls to the containing server control's object. 任何 HTML 标记或不在服务器处理的文本字符串将被视为对象。Any HTML tags or text strings that are not processed on the server are treated as objects. 这些将添加到与其他服务器控件的集合。These are added to the collection like other server controls. 属性允许您以编程方式访问的实例任何服务器控件的类。The property allows you programmatic access to the instance of the class for any server control. 你可以将控件添加到集合、 从集合中，删除控件或循环访问集合中的服务器控件。You can add controls to the collection, remove controls from the collection, or iterate through the server controls in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void DataBind ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void DataBind() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub DataBind ()
public: override void DataBind();

summary.span: 将数据源绑定到调用的服务器控件及其所有子控件。

span.span: Binds a data source to the invoked server control and all its child controls.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Description { get; set; }
.property instance string Description
Public Overridable Property Description As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一条短语，该短语在部件控件的工具提示和目录中用来概述该部件控件的作用。

span.span: Gets or sets a brief phrase that summarizes what the part control does, for use in ToolTips and catalogs of part controls.

value.span: 一个字符串，简要概述部件控件的功能。

span.span: A string that briefly summarizes the part control's functionality.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常是提供列表的一部分控件，以及部件控件的标题栏中的工具提示的目录中使用的字符串。The property is typically a string that is used in catalogs that provide lists of part controls, and as a ToolTip in the part control's title bar. 内容时你的鼠标指针定位在一个部分的控件的标题栏中的标题文本工具提示中显示。The content of the appears in a ToolTip when you position your mouse pointer over the title text in a part control's title bar. 工具提示文本创建的值从属性后, 接一个连字符后, 跟属性值。The ToolTip text is created from the value of the property, followed by a hyphen, followed by the property value. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明性使用中一个部分的控件属性。The following code example illustrates the declarative use of the property in a part control. 此示例需要自定义控件`TextDisplayWebPart`，可在示例部分中找到类摘要。This example requires the custom control `TextDisplayWebPart`, which can be found in the Example section of the class summary. 如果你的鼠标指针定位在的第一个控件实例的标题文本加载在浏览器中，页后，说明文本显示在工具提示。After you load the page in a browser, if you position your mouse pointer over the title text of the first control instance, the description text appears in a ToolTip. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/partoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/partoverviewvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 派生类如可以重写启用的控件的说明的用户个性化设置。

span.span: Derived classes such as can override to enable user personalization of the control's description.

summary.span: 允许复合部件控件设计器的开发人员在设计图面上重新创建控件的子控件。

span.span: Allows the developer of a designer for a composite part control to recreate the control's child controls on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Title { get; set; }
.property instance string Title
Public Overridable Property Title As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置部件控件的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of a part control.

value.span: 一个表示部件控件的标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the title of the part control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过设置部件控件的标题栏中的可见标题文本属性。The visible title text in a part control's title bar is set by the property. 标题文本也显示为工具提示文本的一部分时将鼠标指针放的标题栏控件或出现在其他服务器控件区域。The title text also appears as part of the ToolTip text when you position your mouse pointer over the title bar of a control or other server control that appears in a zone. 标题文本的样式由属性包含部件控件的区域。The style of the title text is determined by the property of the zone that contains the part control. 如果未提供控件的标题的 Web 部件控件集自动计算要用作标题的默认字符串。If you do not supply a title for a control, the Web Parts control set automatically calculates a default string to use as a title. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 另外，还有可能提供追加到的标题字符串标准副标题。Also, it is possible to provide a standard subtitle that is appended to the title string. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For details, see . 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明性使用中一个部分的控件属性。The following code example illustrates the declarative use of the property in a part control. 此示例需要自定义控件`TextDisplayWebPart`，可在示例部分中找到类摘要。This example requires the custom control `TextDisplayWebPart`, which can be found in the Example section of the class summary. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/CS/partoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Part_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Part_Overview/VB/partoverviewvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 派生类如可以重写启用的标题的用户个性化设置。

span.span: Derived classes such as can override to enable user personalization of the title.
